title: Microsoft's trojan horse

►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week Microsoft confirmed bringing the Xbox app store to Androids and iPhones, OnePlus made a triumphant comeback with the OnePlus 12 and Beeper Mini brought iMessage blue bubbles to Android for real this time!

Episode 176
